params.query: Address for which to query authorization as an operator.

returns._0: Boolean indicating if query is authorized as an operator

params.func: Function selector for which to query operator authorization.
params.query: Account for which to query authorization to call `func`.

params.approval: Authorization status to set for newOperator.
params.newOperator: Address for which to change authorization.

params.func: Function selector for which to update authorization of `newOperator`.
params.newOperator: Account for which to update authorization to call `func`.
